Done
find three issues - resend otp functionality , facility card design issue , encounter view detail button align issue

Next :

Next
Looking for new issues

created the issue #12092

next
Time to study as exam start from tomorrowü•≤

May 3rd
‚Ä¢ Finally sem exams is over. Back to üè° for a three-month breaküòÉ.
Next
‚Ä¢ Looking for new issues

May 9th
‚Ä¢ go through valuesets and questionnaire part to get more detail about them.
‚Ä¢ Read some doc regarding caching techniques for seamless offline access of web apps.
Next
‚Ä¢ Again, will try to grab more understanding about the valueset and questionnaire along with their codebase.

May 10
‚Ä¢ Explored all backend API endpoints involved in the Super-Admin ValueSet workflow.
‚Ä¢ Created an API audit table listing method, URL, and offline handling for ValueSet APIs.
‚Ä¢ Started exploring backend API calls for the Super-Admin Questionnaire workflow.
next
‚Ä¢ Going to create the same API audit table for the Questionnaire workflow.
‚Ä¢ Going to explore some more standard workflows that need to be supported offline.

May 12th
‚Ä¢ Call with Aravind Mahadevan regarding workflows that should be supported offline.
‚Ä¢ Check the flow of adding a patient, searching for a patient, and encounters.
‚Ä¢ List the APIs that need to be cached, stored, and synced from the flow checked above.
Next
‚Ä¢ Get started to check all other remaining workflows.
‚Ä¢ Again, sync with Aravind to clarify the flow properly.

May 13th
‚Ä¢ Weekly review meet
‚Ä¢ Done with the list of backend API endpoints list of workflows need to be supported offline.
Next
‚Ä¢ Going to start worked on the CEP for my GSoC project.

May 14th
‚Ä¢ Made minor updates to the GSoC project documentation
‚Ä¢ Opened a PR #<https://github.com/ohcnetwork/docs/pull/140#issuecomment-2881000004|140> in the docs repository to capture those changes
next
‚Ä¢ I‚Äôll begin work on the CEP for our GSoC project.

May 15th
‚Ä¢ Read the TanStack Query cache and persistent on TanStack doc as one of the methods to achieve offline functionality.
‚Ä¢ Add some important points in the document regarding the above approach.
Next
‚Ä¢ Continue adding the proper information about the above approach in the document.
‚Ä¢ Explore more alternatives to achieve offline functionality.

May 16 -17
‚Ä¢ Add alternatives for offline support in the doc
‚Ä¢ Try a demo implementation of offline caching using TanStack Query Cache.
Next
‚Ä¢ Doubt regarding the next steps to follow after adding alternatives in the doc.
‚Ä¢ Going to read some docs regarding UI shell preaching in PWA

May 19
‚Ä¢ Go through some edge cases in tan stack query cache during its demo implementations.
next
‚Ä¢ Weekly Review Meet
‚Ä¢ Try demo implementation of other alternative for offline support
‚Ä¢ Update the doc with these alternatives for offline support

May 23
‚Ä¢ Created a draft PR for the demo implementation of the TanStack Query approach for offline support.
Next
‚Ä¢ Consider using the workbox (service worker) approach for offline support.
‚Ä¢ Update the document for the TanStack approach

June 2nd
‚Ä¢ Update the final document for offline support according to the selected approach for the offline-support gsoc project.
‚Ä¢ Get review and feedback on the document.
next
‚Ä¢ Finally, start working on it

june 3rd
‚Ä¢ weekly review meet
‚Ä¢ Set-up tanstack persister for caching.
‚Ä¢ add some env config through care.config and set-up persiterqueryclient provider
next :
‚Ä¢ complete other task for caching(phase-1)

June 4 & 5
‚Ä¢ update usequery of Add patient and search patient workflows to make them capable to cache data in persistor
‚Ä¢ same for patient profile workflow
Next
‚Ä¢ update usequery for appointment workflow
‚Ä¢ update usequery for encounter workflow

June 6-8
‚Ä¢ Done with updation in all usequery call in appointment workflow.
‚Ä¢ Same for encounter and questionnaire workflow.
Next
‚Ä¢ Add functionality to remove cache data during logout and session expired.
‚Ä¢ Go through some edge cases of caching.

june 9 & 10
‚Ä¢ create a custom function handler to get know about real network status.
‚Ä¢ Test caching and resolve some edge case error
‚Ä¢ weekly review meet
next
‚Ä¢ proper testing of cache logic and improve it
‚Ä¢ start working on phase 2( offline write) after proper working of caching.

June 11 -12
‚Ä¢ Test PWA precaching for UI assets after build
‚Ä¢ add navigation fallback to handle route navigation during offline
‚Ä¢ still testing caching performance

June 13 -14
‚Ä¢ Design and implement table schema for saving offline writes
‚Ä¢ Implement helper function to save the offline form data in the table.
‚Ä¢ Explored ways to handle different-different edge cases during saving offline write
next
Now start with each forms of the workflows going for offline support .

June 15-16
‚Ä¢ working on patient registration form for offline write
‚Ä¢ Worked on three cases in patient registration during offline ( i.e. create patient , update un-synced patient , update synced patient)
‚Ä¢ add some more code to handle edge cases as well
next
‚Ä¢ complete the patient registration workflow

June 17
‚Ä¢ working on patient registration part for offline support
‚Ä¢ weekly review meet
next
complete patient registration part

june-18-19
‚Ä¢ complete patient registration part for offline support

complete offline functionality on verify patient page

June 20

next

june 21 - 22
‚Ä¢ complete the functionality to show newly encounters while offline
‚Ä¢ add functionality to update existing encounter as mark as complete while offline.
next
work on patient Home page to support offline func for resource request , assign user and add files forms.

june 24 -25
‚Ä¢ working on patient home page for offline support
‚Ä¢ add offline support in resource request form
‚Ä¢ test some previous form for offline support

June 26-27
‚Ä¢ Finally solved the issue of 403 API failures during the offline-to-online transition after identifying the root cause‚Äîwas stuck on it for daysü•≤.
‚Ä¢ Clear some other race condition issue while fixing above issue.
‚Ä¢ Almost implement offline support for resource request form and double check it .
next
‚Ä¢ complete resource request form functionality
‚Ä¢ Move to next forms for offline support

June 29-30
‚Ä¢ Debug some bug related to cache not update in some case
‚Ä¢ Add offline functionality to assign and remove user to patient
‚Ä¢ Add offline functionality to create Appointment
Next
Complete Appointment flow for offline support

July 1-2
Add offline support for appointment workflow
‚Ä¢ create Appointment
‚Ä¢ Reschedule appointment
‚Ä¢ update appointment status ( mark as no show , check-in ,in-consultation )
‚Ä¢ cancel appointment( other action related to appointment cancel)
Next
Move to encounter workflow for offline support especially questionnaire and 'mark as complete' part

July 3-4
‚Ä¢ Almost complete all necessary workflows for offline support
‚Ä¢ Go through questionnaire part to understand it code for offline support
‚Ä¢ finally raised the work in progress Pr for offline support till current implementation
Next
‚Ä¢ complete questionnaire part for offline support
‚Ä¢ solve the bugs due to network status check or try will different approach

July 6
Working on questionnaire part for offline support
July 7-8
On leave, As not at home due to some work
Next
Continue working on questionnaire part for offline support

July 11-12
‚Ä¢ Resolve conflict ( https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care_fe/pull/12797)
‚Ä¢ working on questionnaire part for offline support
next
‚Ä¢ check the code again after resolving conflicting
‚Ä¢ Debug bugs in network status hook
‚Ä¢ complete questionnaire part

July 13-14
‚Ä¢ Done some testing of the offline support feature (Phase 1-2 : caching and saving offline records and showing those save record same as shown in online mode in the UI).
‚Ä¢ Improved type safety across offline-related code paths.
‚Ä¢ Ensured compile-time errors occur when payload or API response types are modified.
‚Ä¢ Enforced updates to offline handling logic whenever related types change, improving long-term maintainability.
next
‚Ä¢ Again bit more testing and improvement in code ( specially in network status detection part)

July 15
‚Ä¢ Again some testing and resolve some minor bugs in offline functionality
‚Ä¢ weekly review meet
next
again testing, debugging and improved code quality

July 16
‚Ä¢ Resolved a minor bug in the questionnaire( Medication statements were not showing up in the patient's health profile after being added during offline)
‚Ä¢ Added type safety to pathParams of offline record entry saved when offline . Now any future change in route definitions will trigger compile-time errors, enforcing updates wherever pathParams are used in offline codepaths
‚Ä¢ Submitted Mid-term Evaluation for Gsoc.

July 19, 20, 21 (Couldn‚Äôt make much progress due to festival ( kavad yatra) week ü•∞)
‚Ä¢ Updated the documentation for offline support
‚Ä¢ Added a dependency schema file for handling dependent fields between mutations
‚Ä¢ Designed the architectural overview of the Sync Manager

July 22‚Äì23
‚Ä¢ Started working on the Sync Manager code to sync stored offline records
‚Ä¢ Added functionality to load all pending and retryable records from the database
‚Ä¢ Added functionality to update the sync status of a write after syncing
‚Ä¢ Implemented a topological sort algorithm to ensure parent records are always synced before their child records
next
Add another functionality of sync manager

July 24‚Äì25
‚Ä¢ Added functionality to build a dependency graph among dependent offline records (mutations).
‚Ä¢ Implemented topological sort to ensure each parent comes before its child during syncing.
‚Ä¢ Implemented functionality to detect conflicts and mark records as conflicting during sync.
‚Ä¢ Created a utility for mapping offline-generated IDs to server-generated IDs after sync.
‚Ä¢ Implemented a recursive function to replace all offline UUIDs in a record with their corresponding server UUIDs.
July 26
‚Ä¢ Could not make progress as I was traveling back to college. üò¢
July 27
‚Ä¢ Nothing significant ; was busy with college semester registration.

July 28
‚Ä¢ Implement the main sync functionality that process all offline writes one by one
Next
‚Ä¢ Going to test it first
‚Ä¢ After Test complete it retry management and back-off part

June 29
‚Ä¢ Just spend the day in resolving conflict after merging latest change in my local
‚Ä¢ Fixed some errors in Sync manager
‚Ä¢ weekly review meet
Next
‚Ä¢ Complete Sync Manager

July 30
‚Ä¢ Debug the page could not found issue happening due to incorrect cache update
‚Ä¢ Add a banner to show the syncing process
Next
‚Ä¢ Complete sync manager

Aug 2
‚Ä¢ Working on sync Manager .
‚Ä¢ Test sync Manager and fixes some bugs.
next
‚Ä¢ Again some improvement in sync manager
‚Ä¢ Implement Sync status pages

Aug 4-5
‚Ä¢ Refactor the sync manager
‚Ä¢ Add the header , overview and tab for pending and failed write in it
‚Ä¢ Weekly review meet
Next
Complete the sync status page.

weekly updates
‚Ä¢ Could not attend the weekly review meeting due to network issues.
‚Ä¢ Added edit functionality for each type of offline-supported form in the Sync Status page.
‚Ä¢ Implemented an individual retry mechanism to sync specific records once the user is back online.
‚Ä¢ Added delete functionality to remove offline records from locally saved entries.
‚Ä¢ Completed the major overall functionality of my GSoC project.
‚Ä¢ Currently fixing edge case errors that are occurring .
NEXT
‚Ä¢ Once all edge case errors are fixed, I will push all commits to the PR.
‚Ä¢ Then, I will request a major functionality test from QA and my mentor.

30-31 Aug
‚Ä¢ Resolve merge conflicted of Gsoc project pr and fixed small bugs.
‚Ä¢ Again done some improvement in code and debugging from my side.
‚Ä¢ submitted the final GSoc submission
